 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָט‎</span> **Ez** [[1Chr.16.47|1Chr 16:47]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּמְעַט ק‎</span>), dubious; [[BDB#Ki|Ki]] ***only*** (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); strike out [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]], Toy <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֹאת‎</span>, [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>Anal. 30</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָטָן‎</span>; [[BDB#Krae|Krae]] conjectures <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּיאִֿם עָטַפְתְּ‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎במעטקט‎</span>.
